    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="contracts",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject add​(@RequestBody
                                           com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.oam.ContractVo vo)
        新增合同
        参数:
        name - 合同名称
        payType - 付款方式（枚举）
        contractStartTime - 合同开始日期
        contractEndTime - 合同结束日期
        customerId - 客户id
        cableName - 管线名称
        cableLength - 管线长度
        cableLocation - 管线位置
        storeId - 管仓id
        areaIds - 区域id集合，格式：[1,2,3,4...]
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}

        @RequestMapping(value="contracts/{id}",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getContractDetById​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.String id)
        通过合同编号获取合同详情

        id - 合同编号

      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="contracts/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.oam.CableContractVo vo)
        合同分页查询
        参数:
        id - 合同编号（精确查找）
        name - 合同名称（支持模糊查询）
        customerId - 客户id
        payType - 付款方式
        contractStatus - 合同状态（枚举）
        startTime -
        endTime -
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":3,"list":[{"id":"c1003","name":"合同3","customer":{"id":2,"company":{"id":1,"name":"波汇科技","crtTime":1529596800000},"contact":"联系人0","tel":"13722228880","crtTime":1529979467000},"payType":1,"payTypeName":"月付","contractStatus":1,"contractStatusName":"正常","contractStartTime":1532849333000,"contractEndTime":1532849333000,"crtTime":1532852103000},{"id":"c1002","name":"合同2","customer":null,"payType":1,"payTypeName":"月付","contractStatus":1,"contractStatusName":"正常","contractStartTime":1532849333000,"contractEndTime":1532849333000,"crtTime":1532850908000},{"id":"c1001","name":"合同1","customer":null,"payType":1,"payTypeName":"月付","contractStatus":1,"contractStatusName":"正常","contractStartTime":1532849333000,"contractEndTime":1532849333000,"crtTime":1532849901000}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":5,"size":3,"startRow":1,"endRow":3,"pages":1,"prePage":0,"nextPage":0,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":true,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":false,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":1,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":1}}

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="contracts/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject delete​(@PathVariable
                                              java.lang.String id)
        删除合同信息（同时删除管线信息和关联信息）
        参数:
        id - 合同编号
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}

      • update

        @RequestMapping(value="contracts",
                method=PUT)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject update​(@RequestBody
                                              com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.oam.ContractVo vo)
        更新合同信息
        参数:
        cableContactInfo - -------------------------
        id - 合同编号
        name - 合同名称
        payType - 付款方式（枚举）
        contractStatus - 合同状态（枚举）
        contractStartTime - 合同开始日期
        contractEndTime - 合同结束日期
        customerId - 客户id
        cableInfo - -------------------------
        cableId - 管线id
        cableName - 管线名称
        cableLength - 管线长度
        cableLocation - 管线位置
        cableStatus - 管线状态（枚举）
        sectionInfo - ---------------------------
        areaIds - area集合，格式：[1,3,5,6,7.....]
        storeId - 管舱id
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}
